attributes.action: Make MPs responsible for their actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the expenses scandal, the MPs found guilty of fraud should stand trial just as any normal person would. Especially considering the seriousness of the case, and not be allowed to hide behind their self made parliamentary exclusivity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
